data.configInfo:
Surge dates are defined in go/internal/services/pricing/estimate.go in surgeDateRules map.
To add new surge dates, add entries with format:
"YYYY-MM-DD": {Multiplier: floatPtr(1.5), Label: "Surge Name", Type: "surge"}
Multiplier must be between 1.25 and 3.0. Server restart required after changes.
data.label: February Surge
